Value.label: Automatically switch off after
Value.Help: If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time. Unit: Sec, Min: 0, Max: 65535, Default: 0

Value.label: What to do on RF off command
Value.Help: Defines how to interpret RF Off command. Can be used in conjunction with Auto Off function: Ignore - to switch on the light by motion detectors and switch it off after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to switch the light off that would break logics; Switch on - to switch on the light on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and switch it off after some amount of time. Button off click will still work (if button operations are not disabled).

Item.label: Switch on if load is off else switch off

Value.label: Ignore start level
Value.Help: Defines if the dimmer shall ignore start level in Start Level Change command despite it is specified or not

Value.label: Speed for fast dimming
Value.Help: Time to dim on button presses and Set command (if it has no duration specified). If not 0, dimming will be done smoothly to preserve bulb life. 0=Instantly, 1-255 in 10ms units (Default 30)

Value.label: Speed for slow dimming
Value.Help: Time to dim on button holds and Start Level Change command (if it has no duration specified). Unit in Seconds 1-255 (Default 3)

Value.label: Behavior on 'Switch On'
Value.Help: Defines the dim level on command 'ON'. On default he dimmer restores last dim level. This parameter allows configuring the maximum level on second On command (if already On) or to always switch on to maximum level.

Item.label: maximum dim level when already turned on

Value.label: Baby Dimming time
Value.Help: Time to dim on double click Off button for Baby-Dim function. This function works only if the load is operated by single press and hold button action. If enabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands. Unit in minutes 1-99 (0=Disable(Default)

Value.label: Target dimming level for Baby Dimming
Value.Help: Target level on which to stop while executing Baby Dimming. Can be 0 to completely switch off the light. Unit in % 0-255 (0=Default)

Value.label: Typical click timeout
Value.Help: Typical time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks. in 10ms units (Default 50)

Value.label: Limit minimal light level
Value.Help: Minimal level should be greater than maximal. 1-95 Level limit (Default 1)

Value.label: Limit maximal light level
Value.Help: Maximal level should be greater than minimal. 0=Work as switch: use off and maximal level 10-99 Level limit (Default 99)

Value.label: Dim Level on 'Switch On'
Value.Help: Defines how the dimmer hall react on a simple ON Command. 0-99 0=Use previous light level (Default), 1 . 99 Define light level in %

Value.label: Pause before pulse
Value.Help: NB: Do not touch these settings if you are not sure what they mean! For dimmable LEDs and CFL with bypass use value 1. For other bulbs use default value. 5-60 (Default 28)

Value.label: Pause after pulse
Value.Help: NB: Do not touch these settings if you are not sure what they mean! For dimmable LEDs and CFL with bypass use value 40. For other bulbs use default value. 5-60 (Default 28)

Value.label: Pulse width
Value.Help: NB: Do not touch these settings if you are not sure what they mean! For dimmable LEDs and CFL with bypass use value 20. For other bulbs use default value. 3-20 (Default 10)

Value.label: Pulse type
Value.Help: NB: Do not touch these settings if you are not sure what they mean! (Default 0)
